author: Special Correspondent
text:
In a shocking incident, a 29-year-old youth allegedly killed his own father, said to have happened over a property dispute within the family.

Madurai district police said that Soundarapandi (55), a native of Arasapatti, Tirumangalam, near here, was selling flowers in Tiruchi Worayur. After the death of his wife there, he had come to his village here, where he was running a small shop selling consumables and stationery items.

Troubles started after his son Sendil Kumar, who is married and had his family in Tiruchi, came to know that Soundarapandi had sold a property in the village and thus demanded his share of money.

On Thursday night, both the father and son had a wordy altercation, which snowballed into a big fight in the early hours.

Agitated, Sendil Kumar had broken a glass bottle to assault his father. With bleeding injuries around neck, when he collapsed on the floor, Sendil kumar had thrown a grinder stone in which the victim died on the spot.

On information, the Thirumangalam town police sent the body for post-mortem. Fearing arrest, Sendil Kumar escaped but was arrested.
title: Young man kills father
